modName: 3D Vision No Moon Fix - Creation Kit
summary: Removes moons in Skyrim for better 3D Vision compatibility.
descriptionHtml:
Better fix here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9718


=============================================================================
This fix for the incorrect moon depth simply removes them using the Creation Kit.  


ENB Series fix is overall better, but this mod does not require ENB and will allow you to use other d3d9 wrapper or any other ENB shader enhancement that was incompatible with ENB 3D fixes.

Known issues: I\'m not sure if the HD texture pack is at fault, but Bryce Nebula mods no longer work.

Changelog:
V1.0 - Removes moons from all default weather climates that include them.

======================================================================

To install, use Nexus Mod Manager or drop to:     %:\\\\Skyrim\\Data 

======================================================================

Compatible with Dorkirt\'s sky/sun/stars mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=789

3D Vision Water mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8127

Link with pictures of both Water and Moon Fixes: http://photos.3dvisionlive.com/chizow/image/4f322f90378501c041000097/

-------------------------------------------------------
Credits:
Bethesda for releasing Creation Kit

Nvidia for releasing and supporting awesome 3D hardware

Anyone who has made mods to help make 3D Vision better.
author: chizow
